fullText: Orlando Bloom and Condola Rashad bring sex appeal and genuine chemistry to their star-crossed lovers, but director David Leveaux's production never finds its emotional center.
dtliExcerpt: Orlando Bloom and Condola Rashad bring sex appeal and genuine chemistry to their star-crossed lovers, but director David Leveaux's production never finds its emotional center.
